title: Canada's biggest banks join boycott of Facebook platforms
text: Canada's biggest lenders confirmed on Friday they had joined a widespread boycott of Facebook Inc begun by U.S. civil rights groups seeking to pressure the world's largest social media platform to take concrete steps to block hate speech.

title: In Defense Of All Free Markets, Including Facebook
text: Boycotting Facebook will be as unsuccessful for these brands as the attempts by the original Irish Charles C Boycott in 1880 to evict tenants.

title: The CEO of a major advertising trade group says the Facebook boycott is a turning point
text: World Federation of Advertisers CEO Stephan Loerke believes the slew of big brands publicly pausing social media advertising aren't likely to come back until real change is made. "We moved from brand safety to, I think, societal safety.

title: Facebook's Ad Controversy Continues
text: Zuckerberg is taking a tough stand on the obvious, he could have been more agreeable.

title: What’s wrong with Facebook’s plan to sign up 4 million voters
text: Facebook has launched the largest voter registration effort in history. But this isn’t just any election season—and Facebook isn’t just any get-out-the-vote campaigner.
